|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9220; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device is near identical to the [[D-Link DIR-825 rev B1]].
The principal difference between the two is the screen :- the 673GRU has one, the DIR-825 does not. TRENDnet's FCC ID is XU8TEW673GRU, Cameo's FCC ID is NHPWLAN2202 ==Links of Interest== ===Forum treads=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/trendnet/tew-673gru On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=76797 On '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:53410-11 On '''iXBT''' forums] Per the above DD-WRT forums post, the device will work with the DIR-825 firmware :with the last byte of the firmware changed to an ASCII 1 instead of a 0 ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24 build 16454 20110317 :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=603779#603779 Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/trendnet/trendnet_tew-673gru_10r |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/trendnet/tew-673gru |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
